newsitem.title: USA: Stratasys sees Q2 revs under estimates.
newsitem.headline: Stratasys sees Q2 revs under estimates.

text.p: Stratasys Inc said on Monday that it expected second quarter revenue to come in lower than analysts' estimates because of manufacturing constraints for its new FDM-8000 prototype system, a strong dollar versus European currencies and delays in closing some domestic sales.

However, the company said it still expects record second quarter revenue, as well as a significant increase from the first quarter of 1997. In the period ended March 1, 1997, Stratasys posted quarterly revenue of $5.2 million.
As for the delayed sales, the prototyping systems company said it believes they will be booked in the third and fourth quarters of 1997.
